title: Zed issue 4
body: Does anyone know why Zed issue number 4not up it’s supposed to come out on the 12th but in my time zone it’s 10 pm and nothing does anyone know why is up for anyone else please let me know I’m dying to read this comic

replies.body:
Hey all,

Really sorry for the confusion, the date on Universe is incorrect and it wasn't caught internally. Issue 4 will be coming out on February 19.

Yeah I'm waiting for a long time too. Been reloading the page a thousand times. I guess it's gonna be released on 19th Feb cus it's given like that in the marvel website itself, and I'm dying to see Shen and Zed reunite

I've been wondering why they're taking forever to post it too. Just like you, I'm dying to see what happens. They had issue 3 up by 4am my time, EST, for the last 2 months. And then suddenly it's late and Riot hasn't said a thing? I wanna see the issue, Riot, please release it!
